00040 
00041     This function opens a handle to a process object with the specified
00042     desired access.
00043 
00044     The object is located either by name, or by locating a thread whose
00045     Client ID matches the specified Client ID and then opening that thread's
00046     process.

00049 
00050     ProcessHandle - Supplies a pointer to a variable that will receive
00051         the process object handle.

00054         object.
00055 
00056     ObjectAttributes - Supplies a pointer to an object attributes structure.
00057         If the ObjectName field is specified, then ClientId must not be
00058         specified.
00059

00061         specifies the thread whose process is to be opened. If this
00062         argument is specified, then ObjectName field of the ObjectAttributes
00063         structure must not be specified.
